name: Broot (GGJ 2023)
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------- 

Your name is broot and your goal is to reach other plants.

This game is based around the mechanics of root, which is the theme of GGJ 2023, made in 3 days.

 

--------------------------------[HOW TO PLAY]-------------------------------

 [W] [A] [S] [D] to Move

[SPACE] to jump

[E] to get in the ground (rooting)

[LeftShift] speed up while rooting

Have fun!

------------CREDITS------------

Programming: Deniz Nazari, Sertan Balcı

Level Design: Esat Uçar, Sertan Balcı

Sound Design: Sertan Balcı

Art: Cemile Nazari
